meanings.sent1: She latterly started a new job.
meanings.sent2: I latterly bought a new book.
meanings.sent3: The cat latterly discovered the joy of catnip.
meanings.sent4: His smile latterly brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun latterly peeked through the clouds, bringing warmth.

meanings.sent2: We latterly moved to a new neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel latterly found a hidden stash of acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter latterly echoed in the room.
meanings.sent5: The stars latterly twinkled in the night sky, a reminder of the past.

meanings.definition: In the last few days or weeks
meanings.sent1: He latterly completed his project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: She latterly caught a cold from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The flowers latterly bloomed in the garden, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship latterly grew stronger after the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The snow latterly melted, revealing the green grass underneath.
